text: Here’s what I’ve been working on: <https://github.com/emptypockets-dev/gulp-spot>. It’s based on the boilerplate with a few tweaks based on my workflow. You can run gulp to compile SCSS, babel your javascript, run npm commands, and push to github. The `dist` folder ends up with a structure that keeps all of the separate module/template benefits that HubSpot provides (module  css/js only added to pages when needed/smaller files).
It’s still in progress—feedback is very much welcome. If anyone wants to do any kind of pull request I would appreciate it. I need to practice my github collaboration skills!
